posts.description: My Wedding Night Was Interrupted by a Coke-Fueled Orgy in My Apartment | VICE | United States
posts.extended: My husband and I began using Airbnb in March of 2015. Our first guest was an older man from Halifax, who was in town visiting his dying friend. He shared our passion for cinema, and he would visit us two more times over the next year.

posts.description: The newest important person in newsrooms: audience-development czars - Digiday
posts.extended: The New York Times’ Innovation Report pointed out the need for audience-development specialists to get Times content in front of more readers. While the Times called for a new, cross-departmental approach to this function, other news outlets have already been putting more muscle behind the role.

posts.description: Kevin Hart, Ice Cube are the most distracting driver's ed teachers
posts.extended: Conan O'Brien, Kevin Hart and Ice Cube have taken it upon themselves to teach Conan staffer Diana Chang how to drive — so everyone on the road better watch out. From fire trucks to lane changes to road rage, these unlikely passengers are full of unorthodox advice.
